text: Qul Man Rabbu As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Quli Allahu Qul 'Afattakhadhtum Min Dunihi 'Awliya'a La Yamlikuna Li'nfusihim Naf`aan Wa La Đarraan Qul Hal Yastawi Al-'A`ma Wa Al-Basiru 'Am Hal Tastawi Az-Zulumatu Wa An-Nur 'Am Ja`alu Lillahi Shuraka'a Khalaqu Kakhalqihi Fatashabaha Al-Khalqu `Alayhim Quli Allahu Khaliqu Kulli Shay'in Wa Huwa Al-Wahidu Al-Qahharu
